Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue block or fresh tissue biopsy
Purpose: To detect chromosomal abnormalities associated with T-cell lymphoma using fluorescence in situ hybridization (FISH) on tissue specimens.
Container: FFPE tissue block (paraffin cassette) or sterile container with RPMI medium for fresh tissue
Equipment: Microtome, water bath, hotplate, FISH workstation with fluorescent microscope, automated hybridization system
